types:type.name: all
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type all = Array<{| complaintID: String, description: String, status: String, customerID: String, orderNumber: String, productCode: String|}> {"example": "[{\\\"complaintID\\\":\\\"CP101\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Wrong Item Received\\\",\\\"status\\\":\\\"Opened\\\",\\\"customerID\\\":\\\"C001\\\",\\\"orderNumber\\\":\\\"O101\\\",\\\"productCode\\\":\\\"P1001\\\"},{\\\"complaintID\\\":\\\"CP102\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Wrong Item Received\\\",\\\"status\\\":\\\"Opened\\\",\\\"customerID\\\":\\\"C002\\\",\\\"orderNumber\\\":\\\"O101\\\",\\\"productCode\\\":\\\"P1001\\\"}]"}

types:type.name: single
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type single = {| complaintID: String, description: String, status: String, customerID: String, orderNumber: String, productCode: String |} {"example": "{\\\"complaintID\\\":\\\"CP101\\\",\\\"description\\\":\\\"Wrong Item Received\\\",\\\"status\\\":\\\"Opened\\\",\\\"customerID\\\":\\\"C001\\\",\\\"orderNumber\\\":\\\"O101\\\",\\\"productCode\\\":\\\"P100\\\"}"}
